# Padanian Declaration of Independence

The Sun of the Alps, the [[flag of Padania proposed by Lega Nord]]
on 15 September 1996.]]
The Padanian Declaration of Independence (), fully: Declaration of independence and sovereignty of Padania (Dichiarazione di indipendenza e sovranit√† della Padania) was issued on 15 September 1996 in Venice by Umberto Bossi, leader of Lega Nord.
See also
* Padanian independence
* Umberto Bossi
* Lega Nord
